#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	unsigned int t,len,i;
    int count;
    cin>>t;
	char string[100001];
    while(t--)
    {
		cin>>string;
		len=strlen(string);
		count=0;
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
              if(string[i]=='T')
                count++;
              else count--;
              if(count<0)
                 break;
        }
        count==0?puts("YES"):puts("NO");
	}
	return 0;
}
